text: The Republicans (; LR) is a liberal-conservative political party in France. The party was created on 30 May 2015 by renaming the Union for a Popular Movement (UMP) party, which had been founded in 2002 under the leadership of former President of France Jacques Chirac. The party used to be one of the two major political parties in the French Fifth Republic along with the centre- left Socialist Party (PS), and, following the 2017 legislative election, it remains the second largest party in the National Assembly (behind President Macron's REM), but becomes the fourth in 2022, behind the National Rally, the NUPES and Renaissance. LR is a member of the European People's Party, the Centrist Democrat International, and the International Democrat Union. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Political parties in France Category:Conservative parties Category:Liberal parties
title: The Republicans
